@pixi/canvas-renderer > PIXI > canvasUtils

PIXI.canvasUtils 

namespace canvasUtils

Utility methods for Sprite/Texture tinting.

Tinting with the CanvasRenderer involves creating a new canvas to use as a texture, so be aware of the performance implications.

Public Properties

cacheStepsPerColorChannel canvasUtils.ts:283 
static cacheStepsPerColorChannel: number = 8

Number of steps which will be used as a cap when rounding colors.

canUseMultiply canvasUtils.ts:297 
static canUseMultiply: boolean

Whether or not the Canvas BlendModes are supported, consequently the ability to tint using the multiply method.

convertTintToImage canvasUtils.ts:290 
static convertTintToImage: boolean = false

Tint cache boolean flag.

tintMethod canvasUtils.ts:304 
static tintMethod: Function

The tinting method that will be used.

Public Methods

getTintedCanvas canvasUtils.ts:18 
static getTintedCanvas(sprite: PIXI.Sprite, color: number) → {HTMLCanvasElement}

Basically this method just needs a sprite and a color and tints the sprite with the given color.

Parameters:
Name Type Description

the sprite to tint
sprite.texture
color number

the color to use to tint the sprite with

roundColor canvasUtils.ts:264 
static roundColor(color: number) → {number}

Rounds the specified color according to the canvasUtils.cacheStepsPerColorChannel.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
color number

the color to round, should be a hex color
